name: Finvesta
description: Welcome to the forefront of crypto innovation with FINVESTA, the most deflationary asset on Pulsechain. Our ecosystem is achieving remarkable results, with 1,000+ FINVESTA tokens burned every day! This aggressive token burn enhances scarcity and significantly drives up demand, creating an unparalleled growth trajectory for our community. Where the DeFi Fun Begins on Pulsechain! 4% burn tax & 1% Finvesta reflections goes back to holders. Deflationary design exposed to PRC20 wave theory systems.
